original_title: Midwinter Bathing, L Street Bath, Boston
overview: This film was photographed in the winter, much of it during an actual snowstorm, and snow can be seen on the ground in all scenes. The subject is a group of men, clothed only in swimming trunks, who demonstrate their physical prowess by doing calisthenics, playing handball, and swimming during freezing weather.
title: Midwinter Bathing, L Street Bath, Boston
